description: Don't own a printer

description: No logs/no signup details/pay in cash. Currently using Mullvad.

name: plaintext notes
description: Avoid proprietary file formats (e.g. OneNote). Add structure with markdown.

description: Single responsability. Open/closed. Lizkov substitution. Interface segregation. Dependency inversion.

description: Let the source code explain the what and the how. Comments (if any) should focus on the why.

description: Philips Hue & co. Might become a security/privacy nightmare.

description: Specific. Measurable. Achievable. Relevant. Time-bound.
